title: Latest Ukraine-Russia News: NATO Summit Kicks Off as Russia Defends Mall Strike
content:
1. Latest Ukraine-Russia News: NATO Summit Kicks Off as Russia Defends Mall Strike  The Wall Street Journal
  2. Zelenskyy: Russian airstrike on Ukraine mall 'one of the most daring terrorist attacks in European history'  Fox News
  3. Ukrainian Armed Forces hit Russian forces with 5 airstrikes ‒ Pivden [South] Operational Command  Yahoo News
  4. Russian airstrike hits busy shopping mall in central Ukraine, sparking fears of mass casualties  CNN
  5. ‘There could be children’: search continues amid Kremenchuk rubble  The Guardian
